column4: listen guys: i was playing around with the live cd version of ubuntu before installing it and my sound card was working PERFECTLY , now that i have installed ubuntu on my hard drive the sound doesn't work , i searched around and my soundcard is unsupported , how can this work in the live cd version on not on the full ? anyone?
pop in the live cd and find out
i would do that , but i'm kind a noob in linux -.-'
but can you explain how can an unsupported sound card is working on a live cd ?
are you a noob in putting in a CD into a drive too?
yes. user error
forgive me if i'm beeing to noob , but how can i find out using the live cd if i'm a noob in linux?
so?
you stick in a CD and press the power button. you said your sound worked in the Live CD. how do you know if you haven't booted the live cd yet?
i'll be more direct: you want me to come here to the irc and speak with you in the live cd? and btw , stop the noobish talk about puting a cd in a drive ffs
I simply answered your questions. how do you you ocnnect to the inernte? router with dhcp?
yes.. btw i don't need dumb answers about the cd
then you should have an internet connection on the CD just fine
if you ask dumb questions....
so..an unsupported card works on a live cd and it is UNSUPPORTED , no drivers in linux for that , how is that a dumb question? your retartd
it's a logical impossibiltiy. ergo you are mistaken in some way or other
but since you tell other people who try to help you they are retarded: good luck getting help from anyone unless you pay them
well...it's not impossible , what's my gain in inventing this? you try to help saying me to put the cd in the drive and press the button and saying it's impossible?
you're good , nice help indeed
go away. annoy someone else troll
see? your retarded ffs
you told to put the cd , not to search for modules , and i say i was noob in linux
